Created with inspired architectural finesse matched by exceptionally high standards of craftmanship and painstaking attention to detail, this spectacular house-sized town residence built by renowned luxury builder Vujic Property Group, elevates the concept of family-sized contemporary sophistication to enthralling brand-new heights.
The superbly proportioned masterful design is introduced by a soaring void with striking chandelier and flows past a sublime downstairs main ensuite bedroom and fully fitted study to a vast living and dining room seamlessly connecting via sliding stacker doors to a sun-saturated north-facing entertaining deck and surrounding gardens with plenty of room for the kids to play and the family dog to run free.
Worthy of a master chef, the centrepiece culinary kitchen is unlike anything you have seen before with a Pitt cooktop where the burners seemingly float above the Porcelain benchtops, an induction cooktop, two ovens, two sinks, two European dishwashers, an extra-large integrated fridge and freezer and a waterfall-edge central island/breakfast bar to display your gourmet feasts.
The upper level offers a superb arrangement of a second living zone, a sumptuous main ensuite bedroom, two more bedrooms and a family bathroom.
Along with the advantage of a double garage behind no-maintenance aluminium wood-like battens, this remarkable approximately 35-square residence also features a glamorous powder room with teardrop basin, large laundry, zoned ducted heating and refrigerated air conditioning, thermally broken double-glazed aluminium windows, Engineered Oak flooring, plush carpets, central vacuuming, Quantum Quartz bathroom benchtops, freestanding elliptical soak tubs in each upstairs bathroom, walk-in robes in all four bedrooms, fireplace in living room, side courtyard to enjoy a morning coffee, cavernous under-stair storage, hallway cupboards and bespoke joinery throughout.
Commanding an impressive street presence on approximately 365sqm of land, its close to Princes Park, city-bound trams, local shops and cafés, Gardenvale and Elsternwick Stations, schools and Elsternwick and Glenhuntly Villages.

Description:
Once-in-a-Lifetime Park-Edge Prestige
17A NOW SOLD. 17B AVAILABLE
Step out to the park, step into the sun, secure a once-in-a-lifetime location with cutting-edge inspiration. Due for completion October 2020 just steps from Halley Park, this pre-purchase offering from Jabbour Building Group provides a unique opportunity to enjoy 30sqs of sun-bathed brand-new family living at a tightly-held blue-chip park-edge address. Move quickly to secure one of these two breath-taking homes and be rewarded with a ground-breaking four bedroom, three bathroom, dual zone design with a choice of master-suite upstairs and down, living on each level, and a sun-bathed north-facing bluestone terrace sheltered by an architectural steel part-pergola.
Setting the tone with curvaceous lines and boldly-screened front windows plus a pop of floor-to-ceiling glass, each of these impeccably styled homes will feature a pure-white 2-Pack and elite Italian appliance kitchen (fronted by a Greek Alba marble-island bench), deluxe fully-tiled bathrooms (including a principal dual-vanity ensuite), and bespoke storage including a sublime timber-veneer dressing-room and streamlined media joinery.
Architecturally detailed with a Real Flame gasfire set in a polished concrete feature-wall, this elite specification includes a stone-topped bench for the curvaceous lobby, a sculptural glass-edged stair at the heart of the home, and a custom strip-pendant above the massive kitchen-island. In these luxury homes, fine finishes feature at every turn; with wide 190mm European Oak boards adding impact downstairs, the plushest wool carpets adding softness upstairs, premium-grade stone topping custom cabinetry, and fitted desks beside built-in-robes. Even the smallest details meet the highest standards - from high-end tapware, to LED lightning, to a high-grade aluminium garage door.
Climate-controlled by separate Fujitsu ducted systems on each level, the homes will be secured by Bosch alarm and video-intercom and set beyond a high (1.8m) auto-gated fenceline in a cutting-edge landscape with secure parking out front, a northerly rear, and cool green master-courtyard in between.
Steps to Halley Park (less than 20m), just two blocks to Pattersons village & station, & a walk to a choice of in-demand primary schools and secondary colleges, this is a once-in-a-lifetime family lifestyle opportunity in a family lifetime location.
